code: import React from'react';var Tools=function Tools(){function setLocalStore(name,data){data=JSON.stringify(data);localStorage.setItem(name,data);}function getDataLocalStore(name){if(localStorage.getItem(name)){var data=localStorage.getItem(name);data=JSON.parse(data);return data;}return[];}return{setLocalStore:setLocalStore,getDataLocalStore:getDataLocalStore};};export default Tools;
